name: magic-guard

effect.scarlet-violet: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.the-teal-mask: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Paralysis cannot prevent the Pokémon from moving, though the Speed cut is unaffected. Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Protects against damage not directly caused by a move.

flavor_text.the-teal-mask: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.
